name: 🐭-DODGE
description:
Dodge asteroids! Dodge FAST asteroids! Dodge BIG asteroids!

You get the idea.

Move your mouse to dodge asteroids. You can take 3 hits before dying. As time goes on, harder asteroids spawn and everything starts to spawn faster. Watch out for the small, fast rocks - they'll catch you off guard easily!

Made for Paint Jam 2017 - all graphics were made in MS Paint using the default palette. Would have loved to have made some SFX for this, but my mic wasn't playing ball today. Sorry!

Have Fun!

-Development time: 2 hours 30 minutes total-

(Try to beat my record of 64 seconds! Post scores in the comments!)
